hero.title: The Future of Real World Assets is Tokenized
hero.desc: PrimeX is a multi-chain RWA platform that tokenizes traditional financial assets with licensed exchanges like DIGIFT and Kraken, ensuring accurate pricing and reliable investments.

assets_home.title: Diverse Asset Classes, One Platform
assets_home.subtitle: Institutional-grade opportunities.
assets_home.c1_desc: Tokenized shares of listed companies with real-time pricing from Kraken.
assets_home.c2_desc: Access pre-IPO shares and private company equity via DIGIFT network.
assets_home.c3_desc: Treasury bills and corporate bonds with daily yield distribution.

compliance.title: Licensed & Compliant by Design
compliance.subtitle: Partnering with regulated entities to ensure asset safety.

tech.title: Multi-Chain for Maximum Accessibility
tech.subtitle: Unified liquidity layer.
tech.f3_desc: Manage portfolio across all chains in one view.

transparency_home.title: Transparency at Every Step
transparency_home.subtitle: Verify, don't trust.
transparency_home.t1_desc: Updated daily with detailed underlying asset breakdown.
transparency_home.t2_desc: Real-time on-chain verification by third-party auditors.
transparency_home.t3_desc: Industry experts with view-only access to reserves.

footer.copyright: Â© 2025 PrimeX Global. All rights reserved.

about.mission_desc: Building the most trusted infrastructure for private markets.
about.val1_desc: We believe in verification over trust. All assets are auditable on-chain.
about.val2_desc: We don't cut corners. We embrace regulation to build long-term value.
about.val3_desc: Security and reliability are non-negotiable. We build for scale.

cta_roles.title: Join the Future of Finance
cta_roles.subtitle: Select your role to get started.
cta_roles.issuer_desc: Tokenize assets, raise capital globally, and manage investors effortlessly.
cta_roles.investor_desc: Access institutional-grade private credit and equity with stablecoin settlement.
cta_roles.partner_desc: Integrate with our API to offer custody, data, or distribution services.

platform.hero_desc: PrimeX is more than a tokenization tool; it's a complete financial operating system. From structuring to lifecycle management.

trusted.title: Built on Trust
trusted.subtitle: The pillars of institutional adoption.
trusted.t1_desc: Embedded Reg D/S rules, automated accredited investor verification (KYC/KYB) & AML checks ensure every transaction is legally compliant.
trusted.t2_desc: Smart contracts audited by top-tier firms. Multi-sig & MPC key management technology eliminates single points of failure.
trusted.t3_desc: Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZK) allow for 'verify without reveal' privacy, balancing regulatory transparency with business confidentiality.

products_page.title:
Investment 
Products
products_page.subtitle: Institutional-grade real world assets, fully compliant and tokenized for 24/7 liquidity.

steps.select_desc: Choose assets and sign subscription docs.
steps.mint_desc: Receive tokens instantly in your wallet.

faqs.q1: Who can invest in PrimeX products?
faqs.a1: Accredited investors and qualified institutions who pass our KYC/KYB checks.
faqs.a2: Yes. All underlying assets are held in bankruptcy-remote SPVs or by regulated custodians.
faqs.a3: We charge a 0.5% management fee annualized, deducted from the yield distributions.

assets.tbill_desc: Short-term US government debt obligations backed by the full faith and credit of the US government.
assets.spacex_desc: Indirect ownership in SpaceX via SPV structure. Access pre-IPO growth potential.
assets.tesla_desc: 1:1 backed tokenized shares of Tesla Inc. traded on regulated exchanges.
assets.green_desc: A diversified portfolio of certified green bonds financing renewable energy projects.
assets.gold_desc: Digital tokens backed by physical gold bars held in London vaults.
assets.credit_desc: Senior secured loans to middle-market technology companies.

news_page.title: Newsroom
news_page.subtitle: Latest updates, insights, and announcements.
news_page.subscribe_desc: Get the latest RWA insights delivered to your inbox.

items.n1_title: PrimeX Partners with DIGIFT to Tokenize $50M in US T-Bills
items.n1_desc: A strategic partnership to bring high-quality, yield-bearing assets to the blockchain, enabling instant settlement for institutional investors.
items.n2_title: Q3 2025 Market Report: The Rise of RWA
items.n2_desc: Analysis of the growing trend of real-world asset tokenization and its impact on traditional finance.
items.n3_title: PrimeX Secures SOC 2 Type II Certification
items.n3_desc: Demonstrating our commitment to the highest standards of security and data privacy.
items.n4_desc: New features including streamlined KYC, multi-wallet support, and enhanced portfolio analytics.
items.n5_title: Panel Discussion: Future of Private Credit
items.n5_desc: Join our CEO and industry leaders as they discuss the liquidity transformation in private credit markets.

transparency_page.hero_desc: We believe in "Don't Trust, Verify". Access real-time proof of reserves, audit reports, and legal documentation.
transparency_page.por_desc: We utilize Chainlink Proof of Reserve (PoR) feeds to provide smart contracts with the data needed to calculate the true collateralization of any on-chain asset.

about_page.team_desc: PrimeX is built by a cross-disciplinary team bridging the gap between TradFi and decentralized tech. Our core members bring decades of experience from top-tier investment banks, exchanges, and blockchain protocols.
about_page.contact_text: Interested in issuing or investing? Let's talk.
